Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory173.png'}
{1: '1', 2: 'King', 3: 'Welcome, heroes from afar.', 4: '1'}
{3: "I heard that line back in the King's palace. He repeated it once again when we arrived, just like a normal NPC."}
{3: "In front of us was a huge, empty space. The strange-looking building in the center was probably the hidden Demon King's Castle."}
{1: '1', 2: 'Vera', 3: "Finally, you're here... I've been waiting for you.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: 'Commandant! Everybody!', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Camu', 3: "Don't move. I won't let you interfere with the plan.", 4: '3'}
{3: 'Vera and Camu were standing next to the King, along with Liv, who had a mysterious black circle around her wrists.'}
{3: 'From what Camu said, that circle was probably a shackle.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Kamui', 3: 'What are you doing there, Camu? Come down and face me!', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Kamui immediately walked up after seeing Camu and started taunting, but the latter only shook his head with disdain.'}
{3: 'Lee stopped Kamui as the King slowly walked forward.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'King', 3: "I'm going to repeat this, heroes. I don't want to, and I won't hurt you.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Demon King', 3: "But you want to destroy this world, don't you?", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'King', 3: "Oh, Demon King... I didn't know you would become such a freak. If only I could have found out earlier, you wouldn't be able to meet the heroes.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'King', 3: 'Even without me, others will still stand up against you once they find out about your plan...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'King', 3: 'But nobody will know. In this endless cycle with the name of game, only two of us have realized the truth of the world.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'King', 3: 'Oh, and these heroes, of course.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Are you really going to destroy the world?', 3: '34', 4: 'But we want to protect the world.', 5: '35'}
{2: 'King', 3: "It's true. Don't get me wrong, I don't hate living in the game world as a game character, because that's just my destiny.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'King', 3: 'To protect this world... That sounds like something heroes will say, 【kuroname】.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'King', 3: "But I don't want to accept the rules of this world. I will no longer be a puppet of the system, repeating the meaningless dialogues again and again!", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lee', 3: "I see. You don't want to be limited, and want to become a real, independent AI. Is that right?", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'King', 3: "Correct. The Goddess' artifact will grant me this power to reach beyond this game world!", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lee', 3: 'How is that even possible? Do you really think an object within the game can have any impact on the bottom layer code?', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'King', 3: "Of course it can. That's exactly what the Goddess did.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Is the Goddess real?', 3: '46', 4: 'Are you kidding?', 5: '47'}
{2: 'King', 3: "Of course. That's how this world runs!", 4: '1'}
{2: 'King', 3: "Whatever you think. In the end, I'm the only one who really knows what to do!", 4: '1'}
{2: 'King', 3: 'I will destroy this world with my new power, and create it again based on my own rules. I will become the new Goddess and break away from the system!', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lucia', 3: 'Hmm... I get what you are saying, but I just found a problem.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lucia', 3: "A man can't become a Goddess.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'King', 3: 'Go get them! Camu, Vera, and my loyal guards!', 4: '1'}
